full_text:
IN THE COURT OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF THE FIRST CLASS- ITI
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
Present: Sri. Vinod Babu M.U
Judicial Magistrate of the First Class-III
17" day of February, 2025
CG. 132/2022
Complainant : State represented by the Sub Inspector of Police,
Museum Police Station ( Crime 1193/21).
(By Asst. Public Prosecutor)
Accused Biji.C.S, aged 48/22 D/o Jayaram, Akshaya veedu,
Sooranadu desom, Kunnathoor taluk, Kollam district.
(By Adv. Sri. V.S. Ratheesh Kumar)
Offences : U/s. 279,337 and 338 of Indian Penal Code & 3(1) r/w
181 of Motor Vehicle Act.
Order : Accused is convicted and sentenced to pay a fine of
Rs. 6,500/- for the offence U/Ss. 279,337 and 338 of
Indian Penal Code & 3(1) r/w 181 of Motor Vehicle Act.
In default of payment of fine the accused shall undergo
simple imprisonment for 10 days.
Heard, perused the records and passed the following:
JUDGMENT
1. The accused stands charge sheeted by the Sub Inspector of Police, Museum Police
Station alleging offence U/Ss.279,337 and 338 of Indian Penal Code & 3(1) r/w
181 of Motor Vehicle Act.
2. Accused pleaded guilty through counsel . Particulars of offence U/Ss.279,337 and
338 of Indian Penal Code & 3(1) r/w 181 of Motor Vehicle Act was read over and

2
explained to the accused and he pleaded guilty . This court is convinced
that the plea of the accused is voluntary. Hence his plea is accepted. The
accused is found guilty for the offence U/S.279,337 and 338 of Indian
Penal Code & 3(1) r/w 181 of Motor Vehicle Act and he is convicted
thereunder.

3. Accused is convicted and sentenced to pay a fine of Rs. 6,500/- for the
offence U/S.279,337 and 338 of Indian Penal Code & 3(1) r/w 181 of
Motor Vehicle Act. In default of payment of fine the accused shall
undergo simple imprisonment for 10 days.

(Dictated to the Confidential Assistant, transcribed and typed by her, corrected and
pronounced by me, in open court, on this the 17‚Äù day of February, 2025.)

Judicial Magistrate of the First Class- ITI

Thiruvananthapuram
